ing: 1 pound cooked octopus, cut into bite-sized pieces
des: "Cooked octopus is marinated with green onions, sesame oil and MortonÂ® kosher salt. Raw tuna may be substituted for the octopus if desired."
ins: Combine the octopus, green onions, sesame oil, and kosher salt in a bowl; mix well. Cover and refrigerate 30 minutes before serving.
